original: You can't give a DigiEgg DigiMeals.
translation: You can't give a DigiEgg DigiMeals.

original:
Hey ^P,
can I ask you something?
About that Plate you inserted into
the Evolution Tree...
Is it called a DigiPlate?
Or a Bug Plate?
translation:
Hey ^P,
can I ask you something?
About that Plate you inserted into
the Evolution Tree...
Is it called a DigiPlate?
Or a Bug Plate?

original: It's a DigiPlate
translation: It's a DigiPlate

original: It's a Bug Plate
translation: It's a Bug Plate

original:
That's right! I remember now!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!
translation:
That's right! I remember now!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!

original:
Hmmm... Are you sure...?

I don't think that's quite right...

Could it be you're more careless
than I expected...?
translation:
Hmmm... Are you sure...?

I don't think that's quite right...

Could it be you're more careless
than I expected...?

original:
Hey ^P,
can I ask you something?
A Digimon that looks similar to
Terriermon...
Was it Lopmon? Or Impmon?
translation:
Hey ^P,
can I ask you something?
A Digimon that looks similar to
Terriermon...
Was it Lopmon? Or Impmon?

original: It's Lopmon
translation: It's Lopmon

original: It's Impmon
translation: It's Impmon

original:
That's right! I remember now!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!
translation:
That's right! I remember now!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!

original:
Huh? But I'm pretty sure Impmon 
looks completely different...
I wish you'd learn a bit more about
Digimon, ^P.
translation:
Huh? But I'm pretty sure Impmon 
looks completely different...
I wish you'd learn a bit more about
Digimon, ^P.

original:
Hey, ^P,
can I ask you something?
How many Farm Islands in total
can a Tamer own?
translation:
Hey, ^P,
can I ask you something?
How many Farm Islands in total
can a Tamer own?

original: 4 Farm Islands
translation: 4 Farm Islands

original: 6 Farm Islands
translation: 6 Farm Islands

original:
That's right! I remember now!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!
translation:
That's right! I remember now!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!

original:
Hmmm... Huh?
I'm pretty sure that's not right...
You don't actually know that much,
do you, ^P?
translation:
Hmmm... Huh?
I'm pretty sure that's not right...
You don't actually know that much,
do you, ^P?

original:
Hey, ^P,
can I ask you something?
What was MarineAngemon's
signature Technique again?
translation:
Hey, ^P,
can I ask you something?
What was MarineAngemon's
signature Technique again?

original: Ocean Love
translation: Ocean Love

original: Holy Flame
translation: Holy Flame

original:
Hmmm... Yeah, I think so too!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!
translation:
Hmmm... Yeah, I think so too!

You really are reliable, you know?♪

Then let me give you something as
thanks.
If I ever get stuck again with 
something, I'll be coming to you!

original:
Doesn't that technique belong to
a different Digimon?
I wish you'd show more interest in
Digimon, ^P.
translation:
Doesn't that technique belong to
a different Digimon?
I wish you'd show more interest in
Digimon, ^P.

original:
Hey, ^P,
can I ask you something?
I've been told that I'm always just
too carefree,
Do I really have to pull myself
together like they say?
translation:
Hey, ^P,
can I ask you something?
I've been told that I'm always just
too carefree,
Do I really have to pull myself
together like they say?

original: You're fine as you are.
translation: You're fine as you are.

original: You really do have to!
translation: You really do have to!

original:
I know you'd say that,
^P!
But it's not good to be so kind,
you should tell the truth.
Since now I'm kinda half happy, but
half feeling troubled.
translation:
I know you'd say that,
^P!
But it's not good to be so kind,
you should tell the truth.
Since now I'm kinda half happy, but
half feeling troubled.

original:
WHAAAT?!
...................
But you're right... I can't stay
like this forever.
I better do my best to pull myself
together from now on.
Your straightforwardness really
gave me a shock there, though.
translation:
WHAAAT?!
...................
But you're right... I can't stay
like this forever.
I better do my best to pull myself
together from now on.
Your straightforwardness really
gave me a shock there, though.

original:
What do you like to do in your
spare time, ^P?
Just between you and me, recently
I've been absolutely obsessed...
With popping Digi-Bubble wrap!

It's no fun to just roll it up and 
twist to pop them all, you know?
translation:
What do you like to do in your
spare time, ^P?
Just between you and me, recently
I've been absolutely obsessed...
With popping Digi-Bubble wrap!

It's no fun to just roll it up and 
twist to pop them all, you know?

original:
.......................
.......................
Hm? Did you call for me?

Sorry about that, I was spacing
out there for a moment.
You're saying I do that all the time?
Not at all! You're totally lying!
translation:
.......................
.......................
Hm? Did you call for me?

Sorry about that, I was spacing
out there for a moment.
You're saying I do that all the time?
Not at all! You're totally lying!

original:
Yaaawn...
Good morning. I slept so well.
I had a dream that I was taking 
a nice, long afternoon nap.
translation:
Yaaawn...
Good morning. I slept so well.
I had a dream that I was taking 
a nice, long afternoon nap.

original:
Ah... Ah... Achoo!
Someone's talking about me...
It really is tough to be so popular!
Hehehe!
translation:
Ah... Ah... Achoo!
Someone's talking about me...
It really is tough to be so popular!
Hehehe!

original:
I guess I should get some exercise
sometimes, too...
Hmmm...

Hey, are there any exercises I can
do while sleeping...?
translation:
I guess I should get some exercise
sometimes, too...
Hmmm...

Hey, are there any exercises I can
do while sleeping...?

original:
Hey, ^P, how long to you
usually spend in the bath?
I usually take about an hour, but...
That's never enough for me!
translation:
Hey, ^P, how long to you
usually spend in the bath?
I usually take about an hour, but...
That's never enough for me!

original:
Hey ^P, do you listen to
classical music?
I absolutely love it!
It helps me to fall asleep♪
translation:
Hey ^P, do you listen to
classical music?
I absolutely love it!
It helps me to fall asleep♪

original:
Hey, hey,
let's keep this between us, okay?
......................

...Huh? What was I gonna say, 
again?
translation:
Hey, hey,
let's keep this between us, okay?
......................

...Huh? What was I gonna say, 
again?

original:
Hey, ^P, do you prefer
hot or cold places?
I'm fine with both, 
but I love damp places the most♪
Ehehehe!
translation:
Hey, ^P, do you prefer
hot or cold places?
I'm fine with both, 
but I love damp places the most♪
Ehehehe!

original:
Apparently my fortune for today
is the worst.
Therefore, I should just take it 
easy and do nothing, right?
...What's that? What if my 
fortune was terrific...?
Then I'd probably take it easy and
bask in my happiness!
translation:
Apparently my fortune for today
is the worst.
Therefore, I should just take it 
easy and do nothing, right?
...What's that? What if my 
fortune was terrific...?
Then I'd probably take it easy and
bask in my happiness!

original:
I really want to get stronger,
but I don't like to train...
Is there really no way to level up
just by sleeping...?
translation:
I really want to get stronger,
but I don't like to train...
Is there really no way to level up
just by sleeping...?

original:
My favorite idiom is
'Cream of the crop'.
But I also like 'Apple of one's eye',
as well as 'Piece of cake'...
...What do you mean they're all
related to food?
translation:
My favorite idiom is
'Cream of the crop'.
But I also like 'Apple of one's eye',
as well as 'Piece of cake'...
...What do you mean they're all
related to food?

original:
3... 2... 1... 0!
Alright! My diet is officially over!
I'm absolutely starving!
I gotta eat something, quick!
translation:
3... 2... 1... 0!
Alright! My diet is officially over!
I'm absolutely starving!
I gotta eat something, quick!

original:
Don't you think I'm pretty dashing?

Truth is, I'm aiming to debut as
an idol, you know!
translation:
Don't you think I'm pretty dashing?

Truth is, I'm aiming to debut as
an idol, you know!

original:
Hey, ^P, what kind of
games do you like to play?
Of course the answer's Digimon
games, isn't it? I can tell!
translation:
Hey, ^P, what kind of
games do you like to play?
Of course the answer's Digimon
games, isn't it? I can tell!

original:
I'm Agumon.

I'm a Dragon family, 
Cryptid species Digimon♪
I might look like a Dinosaur,
but I'm not!
I'm gonna get a lot stronger, so 
let's work hard together!
translation:
I'm Agumon.

I'm a Dragon family, 
Cryptid species Digimon♪
I might look like a Dinosaur,
but I'm not!
I'm gonna get a lot stronger, so 
let's work hard together!

original:
I'm Veemon!

I'm a Dragon Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
Let's train hard and go on 
adventures together!
I really can't wait! 
It's gonna be a blast♪
translation:
I'm Veemon!

I'm a Dragon Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
Let's train hard and go on 
adventures together!
I really can't wait! 
It's gonna be a blast♪

original:
I'm Guilmon.

I'm a Dark Dragon Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon.♪
My sharp claws will definitely be
useful in battle!
I look forward to seeing what our
journey will bring!
translation:
I'm Guilmon.

I'm a Dark Dragon Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon.♪
My sharp claws will definitely be
useful in battle!
I look forward to seeing what our
journey will bring!

original:
I'm Dorumon.

I'm a Beast Dragon Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I can dig through the earth using
my powerful claws.
Let's explore lots of different
places together♪
translation:
I'm Dorumon.

I'm a Beast Dragon Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I can dig through the earth using
my powerful claws.
Let's explore lots of different
places together♪

original:
I'm Patamon.

I'm a Holy Beast Family,
Seraph Species Digimon.♪
While I may look weak, I'm actually
pretty strong!
I'll work hard to get strong, so 
please train me well♪
translation:
I'm Patamon.

I'm a Holy Beast Family,
Seraph Species Digimon.♪
While I may look weak, I'm actually
pretty strong!
I'll work hard to get strong, so 
please train me well♪

original:
I'm Biyomon.

I'm a Wing Family,
Bird Species Digimon♪
I want to be able to fly high into
the sky someday!
So please take me with you to
all sorts of places♪
translation:
I'm Biyomon.

I'm a Wing Family,
Bird Species Digimon♪
I want to be able to fly high into
the sky someday!
So please take me with you to
all sorts of places♪

original:
I'm Palmon.

I'm a Plant Family,
Plant Species Digimon♪
Isn't the flower blooming on my 
head pretty?
I look forward to going on
adventures with everyone!♪
translation:
I'm Palmon.

I'm a Plant Family,
Plant Species Digimon♪
Isn't the flower blooming on my 
head pretty?
I look forward to going on
adventures with everyone!♪

original:
I'm Tentomon.

I'm an Insect Family,
Bug Species Digimon♪
I absoutely love nature.

This Farm Island feels pretty
nice to live in, too♪
translation:
I'm Tentomon.

I'm an Insect Family,
Bug Species Digimon♪
I absoutely love nature.

This Farm Island feels pretty
nice to live in, too♪

original:
I'm Gomamon.

I'm an Ice Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in diving!

Let's go on a lot of adventures
together, yeah?♪
translation:
I'm Gomamon.

I'm an Ice Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in diving!

Let's go on a lot of adventures
together, yeah?♪

original:
I'm Terriermon.

I'm an Animal Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I may look cute, but I'm actually
suuuper powerful!
Bring me along on your adventures,
okay?♪
translation:
I'm Terriermon.

I'm an Animal Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I may look cute, but I'm actually
suuuper powerful!
Bring me along on your adventures,
okay?♪

original:
I'm Renamon.

I'm a Dark Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in speedy movements♪

I look forward to seeing what kind
of adventures await us!
translation:
I'm Renamon.

I'm a Dark Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in speedy movements♪

I look forward to seeing what kind
of adventures await us!

original:
I'm Coronamon.

I'm a Fire Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in fire-based attacks!

I can't wait to see what the 
future holds for us!♪
translation:
I'm Coronamon.

I'm a Fire Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in fire-based attacks!

I can't wait to see what the 
future holds for us!♪

original:
I'm Lunamon.

I'm an Ice Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in water-based attacks!

I look forward to seeing what the
future holds for us!♪
translation:
I'm Lunamon.

I'm an Ice Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I specialize in water-based attacks!

I look forward to seeing what the
future holds for us!♪

original:
I'm Gatomon.

I'm a Hold Beast Family,
Seraph Species Digimon♪
While this Farm Island is quite cosy,
I'd like to go out more often too.
Be sure to bring me out on
adventures, okay?♪
translation:
I'm Gatomon.

I'm a Hold Beast Family,
Seraph Species Digimon♪
While this Farm Island is quite cosy,
I'd like to go out more often too.
Be sure to bring me out on
adventures, okay?♪

original:
I'm WarGreymon.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'll work hard to grow even 
stronger!
So be sure to bring me on lots
of adventures, got it?
translation:
I'm WarGreymon.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'll work hard to grow even 
stronger!
So be sure to bring me on lots
of adventures, got it?

original:
I'm MetalGarurumon.

I'm a Metal Beast Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I'll work hard to grow even 
stronger!
So take me out to see lots of
different locations, okay?
translation:
I'm MetalGarurumon.

I'm a Metal Beast Family,
Beast Species Digimon♪
I'll work hard to grow even 
stronger!
So take me out to see lots of
different locations, okay?

original:
I'm Gallantmon.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'll work hard to grow even 
stronger!
So be sure to take me out to see
lots of different locations!
translation:
I'm Gallantmon.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'll work hard to grow even 
stronger!
So be sure to take me out to see
lots of different locations!

original:
I'm Susanoomon.

I'm an Ancient Family,
Seraph Species Digimon♪
I'm happy to have finally met you,
^P.
I look forward to working with 
you♪
translation:
I'm Susanoomon.

I'm an Ancient Family,
Seraph Species Digimon♪
I'm happy to have finally met you,
^P.
I look forward to working with 
you♪

original:
I'm ShineGreymon BM.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'm very happy to have finally met
you, ^P.
Let's work hard together♪
translation:
I'm ShineGreymon BM.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'm very happy to have finally met
you, ^P.
Let's work hard together♪

original:
I'm Omnimon.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'm glad to have finally met you,
^P.
Let us inspire each other to grow
stronger♪
translation:
I'm Omnimon.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
I'm glad to have finally met you,
^P.
Let us inspire each other to grow
stronger♪

original:
I'm Imperialdramon PM.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
You're much kinder than I had
expected, ^P.
Let's work hard and battle 
hard together!♪
translation:
I'm Imperialdramon PM.

I'm a Dragon Warrior Family,
Cryptid Species Digimon♪
You're much kinder than I had
expected, ^P.
Let's work hard and battle 
hard together!♪

original:
I'm ^2.

I'm a ^1 Family,
^0 Species Digimon♪
I'm so happy to be here in this
Farm Island!
I hope you can train and make me
grow stronger♪
translation:
I'm ^2.

I'm a ^1 Family,
^0 Species Digimon♪
I'm so happy to be here in this
Farm Island!
I hope you can train and make me
grow stronger♪

original:
I don't know a single thing about
you, ^P.
At this rate, I'll probably forget
about you in a day or two.
translation:
I don't know a single thing about
you, ^P.
At this rate, I'll probably forget
about you in a day or two.

original:
Do you even have any interest
in me, ^P?
You don't seem to care about me
very much...
translation:
Do you even have any interest
in me, ^P?
You don't seem to care about me
very much...

original:
Hey, ^P,
are you busy?
I wish you could come play with
me sometimes.
translation:
Hey, ^P,
are you busy?
I wish you could come play with
me sometimes.

original:
You seem pretty happy these 
days, ^P.
I also feel happy when you're 
around!
translation:
You seem pretty happy these 
days, ^P.
I also feel happy when you're 
around!

original:
You're really kind, you know,
^P?
I can always rest easy knowing 
you're here for us.
translation:
You're really kind, you know,
^P?
I can always rest easy knowing 
you're here for us.

original:
I really like you, ^P.

I hope we can be friends forever!
translation:
I really like you, ^P.

I hope we can be friends forever!

original:
^P, the amount of playtime
you've accumulated so far is...
^0 hours and　^1 minutes!

Let's continue going on adventures
together!
translation:
^P, the amount of playtime
you've accumulated so far is...
^0 hours and　^1 minutes!

Let's continue going on adventures
together!

original:
^P, you've set...

^0％ of all DigiPlates so far!

It'd be great if there was a 
DigiPlate of you, ^P.♪
translation:
^P, you've set...

^0％ of all DigiPlates so far!

It'd be great if there was a 
DigiPlate of you, ^P.♪

original:
Hey, can I tell you something?

Actually, I'm able to Digivolve into
^0 right now♪
So you can let me Digivolve
whenever you want, ^P!
translation:
Hey, can I tell you something?

Actually, I'm able to Digivolve into
^0 right now♪
So you can let me Digivolve
whenever you want, ^P!

original:
Hey, ^P!

It seems like I'm able to Digivolve
into a bunch of different Digimon!
So what are you gonna do?
Let me Digivolve? Or wait a little?
I'm so excited!♪
translation:
Hey, ^P!

It seems like I'm able to Digivolve
into a bunch of different Digimon!
So what are you gonna do?
Let me Digivolve? Or wait a little?
I'm so excited!♪

original:
...Hmmm...
I'm feeling kinda down...
I can't Digivolve into any Digimon
rigt now, you know?
C'mon ^P, 
give me some more training!
translation:
...Hmmm...
I'm feeling kinda down...
I can't Digivolve into any Digimon
rigt now, you know?
C'mon ^P, 
give me some more training!

original:
Every Digimon has a 'Weakness'.

For example, Cryptid type Digimon
are weak to Dark attribute attacks.
You'll be in trouble if you don't take
attributes into consideration.
translation:
Every Digimon has a 'Weakness'.

For example, Cryptid type Digimon
are weak to Dark attribute attacks.
You'll be in trouble if you don't take
attributes into consideration.

original:
Every Digimon has a 'Resistance'.

For example, Beast type Digimon
are weak to Earth attribute attacks
You'll win in a heartbeat if you take
attributes into consideration.
translation:
Every Digimon has a 'Resistance'.

For example, Beast type Digimon
are weak to Earth attribute attacks
You'll win in a heartbeat if you take
attributes into consideration.

original:
My Skill is 'Bulldoze'.

I can use it to smash apart any
rocks that stand in your way♪
translation:
My Skill is 'Bulldoze'.

I can use it to smash apart any
rocks that stand in your way♪

original:
My Skill is 'Melt'.

I can use it to melt any ice blocks
without breaking a sweat♪
translation:
My Skill is 'Melt'.

I can use it to melt any ice blocks
without breaking a sweat♪

original:
My Skill is 'Tree Cut'.

I can use it to slice apart any
tree that's blocking your path♪
translation:
My Skill is 'Tree Cut'.

I can use it to slice apart any
tree that's blocking your path♪

original:
My Skill is 'Dig'.

I can use it to dig underground
and reach new locations♪
translation:
My Skill is 'Dig'.

I can use it to dig underground
and reach new locations♪

original:
My Skill is 'Dive'.

I can use it to dive underwater and
reach new places♪
translation:
My Skill is 'Dive'.

I can use it to dive underwater and
reach new places♪

original:
I don't have any Skill.

But I'll make up for it by battling
even harder!♪
translation:
I don't have any Skill.

But I'll make up for it by battling
even harder!♪

original:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
HP and MP!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪
translation:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
HP and MP!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪

original:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
EXP!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪
translation:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
EXP!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪

original:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Attack!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪
translation:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Attack!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪

original:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Defense!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪
translation:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Defense!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪

original:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Speed!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪
translation:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Speed!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪

original:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Friendship!
I can't wait to see what kind of
effect it'll have!♪
translation:
The new Farm Goods you've
left here...
It seems to be related to our
Friendship!
I can't wait to see what kind of

Did the earth shake just now?
It did, didn't it? An earthquake??
.........
.........What?

and my lucky item is miso...
...Miso??

Am I... being fooled??

really happy...
That my lucky color is ocher,
and my lucky item is miso...
...Miso??

H...hey, ^P...
Am I... being fooled??

Owww...
Cavities really hurt...

get worse...
But I'm e-even more afraid of the
dentists drill...
W-what should I do...
translation:
Owww...
Cavities really hurt...
I-I'm afraid the pain's only gonna
get worse...
But I'm e-even more afraid of the
dentists drill...
W-what should I do...

original:
^P, what's the scariest
story you've ever heard?
The rumor around the Digital World
right now is...
Something about 'The Digimonkey's
Paw'... 
What's it about, you ask...?
W-w-well, you get three wishes...
...Aaaaaahhhh!
No, I can't take it!
translation:
^P, what's the scariest
story you've ever heard?
The rumor around the Digital World
right now is...
Something about 'The Digimonkey's
Paw'... 
What's it about, you ask...?
W-w-well, you get three wishes...
...Aaaaaahhhh!
No, I can't take it!

original:
Hey, ^P...
Which of these is the scariest,
Narrow places, dark places,
high-up places, or open spaces?
...Hm?! You're not scared of any
of them?! How?!
translation:
Hey, ^P...
Which of these is the scariest,
Narrow places, dark places,
high-up places, or open spaces?
...Hm?! You're not scared of any
of them?! How?!

original:
A-actually...
I'm not a coward at all...!
.........

...T-that just makes me not only a 
coward, but also a liar...
translation:
A-actually...
I'm not a coward at all...!
.........

...T-that just makes me not only a 
coward, but also a liar...

original:
Uwaaaah! Not good!
I'm not gonna make it in time!
.........
...Hm?
I spaced out for a bit there and
imagined I was running late...
translation:
Uwaaaah! Not good!
I'm not gonna make it in time!
.........
...Hm?
I spaced out for a bit there and
imagined I was running late...

but...
What do you think, ^P?
I'm a little concerned...
translation:
I-I like the name ^2,
but...
What do you think, ^P?
I'm a little concerned...

original:

Battles...

knowing who the opponent is...
translation:
I... I don't exactly hate Link 
Battles...
B-but I'm always so nervous, not
knowing who the opponent is...

original:
Hey, um, ^P...
A-are you okay with insects...?
I... I hate them!
I can't even stand looking at them!
Bugs, birds, beats, aquatic, 
seraph, mechanical...
I'm scared of them all...
Even my own shadow...
translation:
Hey, um, ^P...
A-are you okay with insects...?
I... I hate them!
I can't even stand looking at them!
Bugs, birds, beats, aquatic, 
seraph, mechanical...
I'm scared of them all...
Even my own shadow...

original:
W... what should I do,
^P?
Something really scary happened
recently...
I tried my best to forget it, but
it just won't get out of my head...
.........

It's even scary how I can't even
remember what was scary...
translation:
W... what should I do,
^P?
Something really scary happened
recently...
I tried my best to forget it, but
it just won't get out of my head...
.........

It's even scary how I can't even
remember what was scary...

original:
Y...yaaawn!

I've been feeling extra sleepy
lately...
Could... could I have gotten sick?
T-that can't be... right??
translation:
Y...yaaawn!

I've been feeling extra sleepy
lately...
Could... could I have gotten sick?
T-that can't be... right??

original:
Scary things are only scary 
because we think they are...
I'm not afraid...
I'm not afraid...
I-I'm n-not scared...!

.........

...It's no good, I can't even say it
properly...
translation:
Scary things are only scary 
because we think they are...
I'm not afraid...
I'm not afraid...
I-I'm n-not scared...!

.........

...It's no good, I can't even say it
properly...

original:
Hey, ^P, have you ever
overcome your fears before?
I... can't seem to overcome my 
own fears at all...
I just end up freezing and can't do
anything but stare in horror...
translation:
Hey, ^P, have you ever
overcome your fears before?
I... can't seem to overcome my 
own fears at all...
I just end up freezing and can't do
anything but stare in horror...

original:
I...I wonder what kind of place the
Real World is...?
I'd like to pay it a visit if it's not
too scary...
There is one thing I'm wondering,
though...
The 'Real' in 'Real World'...
What does it mean...?
translation:
I...I wonder what kind of place the
Real World is...?
I'd like to pay it a visit if it's not
too scary...
There is one thing I'm wondering,
though...
The 'Real' in 'Real World'...
What does it mean...?

I-I'll work hard to become
stronger...

cryptid species Digimon...
I-I'm not at all like a dinosaur...

stronger...

bird species Digimon...

go on adventures with everyone...

plant species Digimon...
I... think the flower on my head
is quite pretty...
I'm scared, but... I really want to

type beast species Digimon...
A-actually, I'm pretty good at

translation:

translation:

beast species Digimon...
I-I'm pretty proud of my speed...

beast species Digimon...

beast species Digimon...

beast species Digimon...

translation:

beast species Digimon...

techniques...

stronger...

type seraph species Digimon...
I-I hope this farm won't be too
scary...
B-bring me on lots of adventures,
okay...?
translation:

type seraph species Digimon...
I-I hope this farm won't be too
scary...

okay...?

cryptid species Digimon...

translation:

warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I-I'll do my best and work hard...

S-so please train me well, okay?

beast type 
beast species Digimon...

I-I'll work hard and fight lots of
battles...
So I hope one day... I'll stop being
so cowardly...

beast type 
beast species Digimon...

I-I'll work hard and fight lots of
battles...

so cowardly...

warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I-I'll fight lots of battles and grow
stronger...
I can do it so long as your here
with me, ^P...
translation:
I... I'm Gallantmon, a dragon 
warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I-I'll fight lots of battles and grow
stronger...
I can do it so long as your here
with me, ^P...

original:
I... I'm Susanoomon, an ancient 
type seraph species Digimon...
W-we're finally able to meet,
^P...
Let's do our best and work hard
from now on...
translation:
I... I'm Susanoomon, an ancient 
type seraph species Digimon...
W-we're finally able to meet,
^P...
Let's do our best and work hard
from now on...

original:
I... I'm ShineGreymon BM,
a dragon warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I've been searching for a Tamer 
for so long... now you're here.
I'll be okay now...
I won't be afraid anymore...!
translation:
I... I'm ShineGreymon BM,
a dragon warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I've been searching for a Tamer 
for so long... now you're here.
I'll be okay now...
I won't be afraid anymore...!

original:
I... I'm Omnimon,
a dragon warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I-it's hard having to meet 
everyone's expectations...
I'm such a coward... I hope you
can help me change for the better..
translation:
I... I'm Omnimon,
a dragon warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I-it's hard having to meet 
everyone's expectations...
I'm such a coward... I hope you
can help me change for the better..

original:
I... I'm Imperialdramon PM,
a dragon warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I no longer have anything to fear
after meeting you...
I'll do my absolute best, s-so...
nice to meet you...
translation:
I... I'm Imperialdramon PM,
a dragon warrior type 
cryptid species Digimon...

I no longer have anything to fear
after meeting you...
I'll do my absolute best, s-so...
nice to meet you...

original:
I... I'm ^2,
a ^1 type 
^0 species Digimon...

T-this is your Farm Island,
^P...?
It's wonderful... Is it really okay 
for me to be here...?
translation:
I... I'm ^2,
a ^1 type 
^0 species Digimon...

T-this is your Farm Island,
^P...?
It's wonderful... Is it really okay 
for me to be here...?

original:
I... don't really like ^P...

They give off... a scary vibe...
translation:
I... don't really like ^P...

They give off... a scary vibe...

original:
I'm not really interested in
^P...
They have such a scary face...
translation:
I'm not really interested in
^P...
They have such a scary face...

original:
H-hey, ^P...
Have you been busy lately...?
It'd be great if... you'd come by
and place with us more often...
translation:
H-hey, ^P...
Have you been busy lately...?
It'd be great if... you'd come by
and place with us more often...

original:
Do... you enjoy being with me,
^P...?
I... want to lead an even more
enjoyable lifestyle...
translation:
Do... you enjoy being with me,
^P...?
I... want to lead an even more
enjoyable lifestyle...

original:
Y-you're so kind, ^P...

I... I'm so glad you're my Tamer...
translation:
Y-you're so kind, ^P...

I... I'm so glad you're my Tamer...

original:
I'm so glad I met you,
^P...
P-please continue to be my
Tamer forever...
translation:
I'm so glad I met you,
^P...
P-please continue to be my
Tamer forever...

original:
^P, it looks like y-your
play time is...
A-about ^0 hours and ^1 minutes...

W-we all look forward to spending
even more time with you...
translation:
^P, it looks like y-your
play time is...
A-about ^0 hours and ^1 minutes...

W-we all look forward to spending
even more time with you...

original:
^P, you've completed
setting...
...^0% of the DigiPlates so far...
..........
I-I don't know why, but...

I feel a little uneasy thinking about
my own DigiPlate...
translation:
^P, you've completed
setting...
...^0% of the DigiPlates so far...
..........
I-I don't know why, but...

I feel a little uneasy thinking about
my own DigiPlate...

U-um... Can I speak with you for
a minute...?
Y-you see, I'm able to Digivolve
into ^0 right now...
S-so... if possible...
let me Digivolve, okay...?
translation:
U-um... Can I speak with you for
a minute...?
Y-you see, I'm able to Digivolve
into ^0 right now...
S-so... if possible...
let me Digivolve, okay...?

original:

It looks like I can Digivolve into lots
of different Digimon right now...
So I can Digivolve... whenever you
want me to, ^P...
translation:
U-um, you know...?

It looks like I can Digivolve into lots
of different Digimon right now...
So I can Digivolve... whenever you
want me to, ^P...

original:
I-it seems...

I can't Digivolve into any Digimon
right now...
S-so, please train me more,
^P...
I... I'm counting on you!
translation:
I-it seems...

I can't Digivolve into any Digimon
right now...
S-so, please train me more,
^P...
I... I'm counting on you!
